body.p:
Caseyville Union Co Ky
May the 27th 1861
To his Excelency B Magoffin
Gov of Ky.
Dear Sir

We are anxious to form a Military Company here for the State Malitia and have failed because we do not understand the Nature of the oath to be take. please inform us to what extent our allegience goes to the Genl Government, and also to that of your Excelency,, And excuse this intrusion on the honored executive of the state. since we have failed to get the desired information from Genl Buckner.
